text: aur yadi aap ahle kitaab ke paas pratyek prakaar kee nishaanee la den, tab bhee ve aapake qibale ka anusaran nahin karenge aur na aap unake qibale ka anusaran karenge aur na unamen se koee doosare ke qibale ka anusaran karega aur yadi gyaan aane ke pashchaat aapane unakee aakaankshaon ka anusaran kiya, to aap atyaachaariyon mein se ho jaayenge
